General.Name: Sunson Textile Manufacturer
General.Description: PT Sunson Textile Manufacturer Tbk manufactures and sells yarn, fabric, and other textile products in Indonesia. It operates in three segments: Spinning, Weaving, and Others. The company yarn and woven fabric made from cotton, TC, CVC, TR, and DTY polyester yarns. It is also involved in general trading activities. The company also exports its products to Europe, the United States, rest of Asia, and Africa. PT Sunson Textile Manufacturer Tbk was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Bandung, Indonesia.
